short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a dark mode for the ticketing system, FreshDesks, and possibly extend that functionality to other websites as well.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of burning your eyes while widling away at your ticket queue? Well now you can save your eyes with FreshDark, a dark mode extension for the ticketing system FreshDesks. 

The extension currently only works with the domains my company uses to access FreshDesks, but the extension can be easily adapted for most other domains, including websites besides FreshDesks. If there is a site you would like me to create a variation of this extension for, please reach out to me directly.
